resources.string: Enter up to 3 phone numbers to send SMS to when ride starts
Your Name will be included in the message so they know who it\'s from
Enable tracking first, then check your email for a message from support@hammerhead.io. In the message find the unique URL and enter it below. Replace UniqueText with your own unique URL text
NOTE: if you disable and re-enable tracking the URL will change, be sure to come back and correct it!
Switch ON to use SMS Gateway for sending SMS. Switch OFF to send SMS directly from the device.
